nox.midnightconfig.title: Nox Configuration
nox.midnightconfig.noFriendlyFire: Mobs can't damage other Mobs with the same target
nox.midnightconfig.monsterGearScales: Monster gear scales with the closest Player's gear
nox.midnightconfig.blockBreakingHardness: Max hardness level Mobs can mine
nox.midnightconfig.creeperBreachDistance: Distance Creepers can breach walls. -1 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.guardiansWaterOnDeath: Guardians place flowing water on death
nox.midnightconfig.guardiansWaterSourceO: If the above is enabled, Guardians place a water source on death
nox.midnightconfig.magmaCubeLavaOnDeath: Magma Cubes place flowing lava on death
nox.midnightconfig.sleepExtendToSeaLevel: Sleep check vertical range is extended to sea level
nox.midnightconfig.freeRangeGuardiansSpa: The spawn weight of Guardians in oceans. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.witherSkeletonsSpawnN: Wither Skeletons spawn in Warped Forests & Soul Sand Valleys
nox.midnightconfig.endermiteFlowerSpawn: Chorus Flowers spawn an Endermite when broken
nox.midnightconfig.creepersRunFromShield: Creepers will run from shielding Players
nox.midnightconfig.spidersPlaceCobwebs: Spiders place cobwebs at your feet on attack
nox.midnightconfig.witherSkeletonArchers: Wither Skeletons can spawn with bows
nox.midnightconfig.witchLingeringPotionR: Witch lingering potion radius. Set to 0 to disable lingering potions
nox.midnightconfig.caveSpiderSlownessBit: Cave Spider slowness bite duration. Set to 0 to disable
The level of slowness Cave Spiders inflict
nox.midnightconfig.endermanBlindnessStar: Length of blindness inflicted by staring at a Enderman. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.endermanBlindnessHitD: Length of blindness inflicted by being hit by a Enderman. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.phantomWeaknessBiteDu: How long a Phantom's weakness bite lasts. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.shulkerBulletBlindnes: How long the blindness effect from Shulker bullets lasts. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.silverfishMiningFatig: How long the mining fatigue effect from Silverfish bites lasts. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.magmaCubeContactFireD: How long the fire effect lasts after coming into contact with a Magma Cube. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.straySlownessLevel: The level of slowness Stray's inflict
nox.midnightconfig.blazeBurnAura: Radius blazes can set you on fire. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.blazeAuraDuration: Length of fire from blaze auras
nox.midnightconfig.slimePoisonCloudRadiu: Multiplier (* slime size) for poison clouds spawned on Slime death
nox.midnightconfig.slimePoisonCloudDurat: Divisor (slime size /) for slime poison cloud duration. Set to 0 to disable
nox.midnightconfig.slimePoisonAmplifier: Level of poison inflicted by slime poison clouds
nox.midnightconfig.witherSkeletonsWither: Radius in which Wither Skeletons inflict wither. Set to 0 to disable
Duration of wither effect inflicted by Wither Skeletons aura
nox.midnightconfig.snowGolemInverseAccur: Snow Golem inverse accuracy. Set to 0 for perfect accuracy
nox.midnightconfig.witherBlockBreakingCo: Wither block breaking cooldown, in ticks
nox.midnightconfig.witherSkeletonSummonC: Wither's cooldown for summoning Wither Skeletons, in ticks
